name: Roasted Sweet Almond Oil
description: Clean nut flavor complements fish, asparagus, cream soups, or light vinaigrettes.  Can also be used for baking.  High in antioxidants, and a great source of omega 6 fatty acids.  Smoke point is 430°.  Pairs beautifully with Red Apple balsamic.

name: Toasted Japanese Sesame Oil
description: Lends Asian authenticity to stir-fry or noodle dishes, and  makes a delicious dressing for a Chinese chicken salad.   Drizzle on asparagus, green beans, and other vegetables.  Pair with Honey Ginger balsamic.  Smoke point is 445°.

name: Butternut Squash Seed Oil
description: Oil from roasted pressed squash seeds, use for sautéing, grilling or roasting vegetables and meats, or as a flavoring oil in prepared dishes. Nutty taste, great replacement for nuts for those with allergies. High in polyunsaturated fats, rich in vitamin E.  Smoke point is 425°.

name: Roasted Pumpkin Seed Oil
description: All-natural, expeller-pressed unrefined oil made with non-GMO pumpkin seeds. Complements grilled vegetables, roasted fish, sautéed leafy greens. Drizzle on pasta, squash soup. Low smoke point, so best used for finishing.

name: White Truffle Oil
description: Earthy bouquet and intense somewhat garlicky white truffle flavor.  Finish meats, soups, potato dishes, risotto or pasta dishes.  Take French fries or popcorn to a new level with a few drizzles. This is a rare treat!
